skills.name: Discerning Eye A
skills.detail: Increase Critical Strength (3 turns) & NP Gauge for one ally

skills.name: Tactician's Advice A+
skills.detail: Increase DEF (3 turns) & apply Incoming Damage Cut (3 turns) & slightly increase NP Gauge for all allies

skills.name: Tactician's Command A+
skills.detail: Increase ATK (3 turns) & apply Damage Plus (3 turns) & slightly increase NP Gauge for all allies

noblePhantasms.name: Unreturning Formation
noblePhantasms.detail: Decrease Charge & DEF (3 turns) & medium chance to inflict Stun (1 turn) <chance increases with Overcharge> & Curse (3 turns) for all enemies

buffs.name: Curse
buffs.detail: Lose HP at end of each turn

noblePhantasms.name: Unreturning Formation
noblePhantasms.detail: Decrease Charge & medium chance to inflict Stun (1 turn) <chance increases with Overcharge> & inflict Curse▲ (6 turns) & greatly decrease DEF ▲ (3 turns) for all enemies

buffs.name: Curse
buffs.detail: Lose HP at end of each turn

comments.comment:
Lord El-Melloi II originally didn't possess the capacity or the history to become a Servant.
But due to the extremely special circumstances of this Holy Grail War, he was successfully summoned as a vessel for Zhuge Liang, a Heroic Spirit from ancient China.

Height/Weight: 186cm, 68kg
Origin: Romance of the Three Kingdoms
Region: China
Alignment: Neutral-Good
Gender: Male
A monster of rationalism.

Zhuge Liang was well-known as a superior politician and serviceman during the Three
Kingdoms era of China.
It is said that he played a great role in the small, weak kingdom of Shu in resisting
the major kingdom Wei for a long time.

This Servant is neither El-Melloi II nor Zhuge Liang. Both of their strengths fused together and enabled this Servant to unleash powers he wasn't able to before. The thought patterns and emotions are based on the vessel, El-Melloi II.

Discerning Eye: A
Unique skill. This skill did not originate
from Zhuge Liang, but rather from El-Melloi II. A variant of Human Observation, this skill allows the user to tell the observed target how to maximize their full potential.

『Unreturning Formation』
Rank: C
NP Type: Anti-Army
The legendary formation used by Zhuge Liang when he had his troops retreat.
Once anybody enters his stone sentinel maze, that person will be lost inside the maze until death.

Pseudo-Servant... A Heroic Spirit that cannot become a Servant for some reason, they have been summoned to the world by using a human body as their vessel.
Several other Pseudo-Servants have been confirmed aside from Lord El-Melloi II.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh, the day you were born? If it's something to celebrate, then celebrate.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle: It seems there's been some trouble. Go take a look.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Now, shall we head out soon?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I will only ever serve one person. Just think of me as one piece on the board.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: I have absolutely no intention of serving anyone other than that conquering idiot. However, I want to be on good terms with you.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: My likes... well. Perceptive students, quiet classrooms, and colleagues whose brains are not filled with tofu... that's about it.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: The type I dislike? Violent men, vulgar men, men without dreams or ambition. It's the same for women.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: Holy Grail, hmm, I have no need for it. But I would like to dismantle it.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Ah, so annoying.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle: You're in the way.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Reines? ...No, I am Zhuge Liang. I don't know what you're talking about. Hey, don't try to contact the Clock Tower!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle: ...By the way, is the Far East affected by the change in history? Like Akihabara, or video games... Oh, there's none? I see...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle: As you can see, I'm in the middle of a game. I don't mind you talking to me, but please don't play with my hair. It's very distracting.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
How strange. I had come to terms with not meeting him again, but to have the chance to stand side by side once more.
Really... at least there has been something positive, even in humanity's crisis.

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: Finally, one step closer.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501900_0_G020]...There's a long way to go.
[id 501900_0_G021]Well, I wonder how long until I become a tactician who can advise him.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 501900_0_G030]It seems to me a miracle that I have come so far.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: I am Servant Zhuge Liang...What? You are asking if I am the wrong person?

[r]
Exactly, I am actually El-Melloi the Second.[r]But I did inherit all the powers, so there's no issue there.
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am Servant Zhuge Liang...What? You are asking if I am the wrong person? 
Exactly, I am actually El-Melloi the Second.
But I did inherit all the powers, so there's no issue there.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Fourth Holy Grail war?
It might be somewhat harsh for a practical assignment, but there was a Mage even less experienced than you who made it back alive.
Do not fret.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Very well. I'll give your grades.
...Oho? Not too bad. Keep it up.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Submitting your report?
Ah, just leave it there. I'm in an online match right now and I can't leav... No, nothing to do with you, don't worry about it.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
By the way, you didn't take the wrong credits, did you?
Every so often I get a careless student like that.
Make sure you check the curriculum.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Even field work is life and death in the Clock Tower.
Though it's an inevitable risk for one who plans to study magecraft.
Work hard so that you don't meet an end worse than death.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Training is over for this term. No supplementary classes.
Your results were... Well, your acquisition of credits was satisfactory. Well done.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
I hope you've received your proof of attendance and diploma?
You've taken my intensive class. You should use the skills you've learned.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Training is over for this term.
I hope you've learned something along the way.
Don't leave any personal items in the classroom.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You've finished. I'd guess you've managed a passing grade.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Oho? That's impressive. Keep it up.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmm. A new task, then. This one won't be so easy.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Very well. Let's progress to the next stage.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 5
voiceLines.subtitle: It's in a different classroom next time. Don't be late.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 6
voiceLines.subtitle: Splendid. One fate has been overturned by your exertions.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 7
voiceLines.subtitle: You've submitted all your tasks. Well done.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 8
voiceLines.subtitle: Congratulations. It's been a long journey, but your classes end here. Do you want to participate in my lectures next term? Students with potential are always welcome.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a strategy.

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a trap.

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: It's futile.

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Deplorable. That was too easy.

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Ridiculous.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmm, then let's do this.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Battle? It's an action I would rather avoid, but it seems I have no choice.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I shall destroy you in one go. Let's do this, Master.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: If the sacrifices are low, that too is a victory.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: That was an almost perfect victory, but I should be able to win before the fighting starts.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ahh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: How careless...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This is it, I leave the rest to you...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Rider... I fear I have disgraced your name.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmph.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Boring.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: As you command.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Fighting is not just physical attacks.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501900_0_B050]This is the ultimate formation of the Great Tactician,
[id 501900_0_B051]Unreturning Formation. Break it if you can.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Fourth Holy Grail war?
It might be somewhat harsh for a practical assignment, but there was a Mage even less experienced than you who made it back alive.
Do not fret.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Very well. I'll give your grades.
...Oho? Not too bad. Keep it up.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Submitting your report?
Ah, just leave it there. I'm in an online match right now and I can't leav... No, nothing to do with you, don't worry about it.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
By the way, you didn't take the wrong credits, did you?
Every so often I get a careless student like that.
Make sure you check the curriculum.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Even field work is life and death in the Clock Tower.
Though it's an inevitable risk for one who plans to study magecraft.
Work hard so that you don't meet an end worse than death.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Training is over for this term. No supplementary classes.
Your results were... Well, your acquisition of credits was satisfactory. Well done.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
I hope you've received your proof of attendance and diploma?
You've taken my intensive class. You should use the skills you've learned.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Training is over for this term.
I hope you've learned something along the way.
Don't leave any personal items in the classroom.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You've finished. I'd guess you've managed a passing grade.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Oho? That's impressive. Keep it up.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmm. A new task, then. This one won't be so easy.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Very well. Let's progress to the next stage.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 5
voiceLines.subtitle: It's in a different classroom next time. Don't be late.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 6
voiceLines.subtitle: Splendid. One fate has been overturned by your exertions.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 7
voiceLines.subtitle: You've submitted all your tasks. Well done.

voiceLines.name: About the Mission 8
voiceLines.subtitle: Congratulations. It's been a long journey, but your classes end here. Do you want to participate in my lectures next term? Students with potential are always welcome.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: Birthday? That's only a measure, it's not a day to make a special fuss about.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Seems there's some trouble...
Wanna go check it out?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Let's head out. Like they say, the early bird catches the worm.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
I will only ever serve one person.
Just think of me as one piece on the board.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: I have absolutely no intention of serving anyone other than that conquering idiot. However, I want to be on good terms with you, not just as Master and Servant.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: My likes... That's easy. Someone who can recognize my talent and is worthy of respect.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: I dislike violence. He may look like he's progressing, but he's really just retreating.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: The Holy Grail? I don't need it. I wouldn't mind dismantling it, though.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: What is it? You're so annoying.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle: You're in the way.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Reines? ...N-no, I am Zhuge Liang, so I don't know what you're talking about. Hey, don't try to contact the Clock Tower!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle: ...By the way, is the Far East affected by the change in history? Like Akihabara, or video games... Oh, there's none? I see...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle: As you can see, I'm in the middle of a game. I don't mind you talking to me, just don't interrupt. I'm doing a speed run. I couldn't stand to have all the time I've put into this go to waste!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
I like you too. To make a contract with one so reckless as him.
Huh, who do I mean?
That's obvious.
That big, loud Rider with the big attitude!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: Of course I'm going to grow, I'm still a young man.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 501900_2_G040]Look, Rider! I can do it if I try! [id 501900_2_G041]...Huh?

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501900_2_G050]This is my limit... Well, can't be helped.
[id 501900_2_G051]My thanks, Master. It's thanks to you that I have come this far.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a strategy.

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a trap.

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: It's futile.

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Too easy!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: What a boring lot. Don't you have anything better to do?

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Well, how about this?

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Battle? I would rather avoid that right now, but it seems I have no choice.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm going to come at you all at once!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: A victory is a victory, even this one. Yes.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: That was an almost perfect victory, but I should be able to win before the fighting starts.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Agh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Aaagh!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Is this it? Dammit...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Sorry Rider...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: All right.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Here I go!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Everything is as I planned it, apparently!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501900_2_B050]This is the ultimate formation of the Great Tactician,
[id 501900_2_B051]Unreturning Formation.
